caption.p: Cichoric acid content model: ( a) Pareto chart; ( b) actual vs. predicted results. Independent variables: A = glycerol concentration; B = temperature; C = ultrasound power; D = time; E = ascorbic acid concentration. Blue color on the chart ( a) indicates a negative and the orange color refers to a positive effect of independent variables. The color points on the chart ( b) represent the value of cichoric acid (blue: lowest value; red: highest value).
